mapper.select: SELECT a.sectionFee + a.monthFee AS Fee FROM globalbiz.MemFeeInfo AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptMst AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType WHERE b.deptCD = #{deptCD} AND a.bookNum = #{bookNum} AND a.weekNum = #{week}

SELECT a.memKey, CONCAT(IFNULL(mFstName,''), IFNULL(mLstName,'')) AS memName, CONCAT(IFNULL(gFstName,''), IFNULL(gLstName,'')) AS guardianName, addr AS address, city, ePhone AS phone, MIN(statusCD) AS statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{jisaCD},'0008', MIN(statusCD),'','') AS statusName FROM globalbiz.MemMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS b ON a.memKey = b.memKey WHERE CONCAT(mFstName, mLstName) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR CONCAT(gFstName, gLstNAme) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') GROUP BY a.memKey, a.mFstName, a.mLstName, a.gFstName, a.gLstName, a.addr, a.city, a.ePhone
SELECT * FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst WHERE memKey = #{memKey} ORDER BY statusCD

SELECT a.jisaCD, a.deptCD, a.subj, a.studyNum AS subjStudyNum, a.bookNum AS subjBookNum, a.monthNum AS subjMonthNum, a.digYN AS subjDigYN, a.sortCD, b.memKey, b.statusCD, b.yoil, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0006',b.yoil,'E','') AS yoilName, b.studyNum, b.bookNum, b.visitHours FROM globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aa.memKey, aa.subj, statusCD, aa.yoil, aa.studyNum, aa.bookNum, bb.visitHours FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS aa INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS bb ON aa.memKey = bb.memKey AND aa.subj = bb.subj WHERE aa.memKey = #{memKey} ) AS b ON a.subj = b.subj WHERE a.jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD = #{deptCD} ORDER BY -b.statusCD DESC, a.sortCD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemMst (memKey, mFstName, mLstName, mBirthDay, gradeCD, schoolName, mEmail, eContact, ePhone, gFstName, gLstName, city, stateCD, zip, addr, gEmail, gPhone, gCellPhone, registWhy, registWhyEtc, registHow, registHowEtc, remarks, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) VALUES(#{memKey}, #{mFstName}, #{mLstName}, #{mBirthDay}, #{gradeCD}, #{schoolName}, #{mEmail}, #{eContact}, #{ePhone}, #{gFstName}, #{gLstName}, #{city}, #{stateCD}, #{zip}, #{addr}, #{gEmail}, #{gPhone}, #{gCellPhone}, IFNULL(#{registWhy},''), IFNULL(#{registWhyEtc},''), IFNULL(#{registHow},''), IFNULL(#{registHowEtc},''), #{remarks}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN c.freeType IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE registFee END AS registFee, b.monthFee, b.sectionFee, b.feeUnit, IFNULL(c.freeType, '') AS freeType FROM globalbiz.DeptMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemFeeInfo AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType LEFT JOIN globalbiz.MemFeeFreeTerm AS c ON a.jisaCD = c.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = c.deptCD AND NOW() BETWEEN c.startYMD AND c.endYMD WHERE a.deptCD = #{deptCD} AND b.weekNum = #{weekNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjMst (memKey, subj, statusCD, memName, yoil, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, registFstYMD, registFnlYMD, dropFnlYMD, expireYMD, feeFnlYMD, yoilChgYMD, studyNumChgYMD, bookNumChgYMD, befoYoil, befoStudyNum, befoBookNum, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) VALUES(#{memKey}, #{subj}, #{statusCD}, #{memName}, #{yoil}, #{studyNum}, #{bookNum}, #{digGrade}, #{registFstYMD}, #{registFnlYMD}, #{dropFnlYMD}, #{expireYMD}, #{feeFnlYMD}, #{yoilChgYMD}, #{studyNumChgYMD}, #{bookNumChgYMD}, #{befoYoil}, #{befoStudyNum}, #{befoBookNum}, #{empKey}, #{deptCD}, #{jisaCD}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID})

INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjStudy (memKey, subj, studyNum, bookNum, yoil, yoilSeq, bookFlag, visitHours, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) VALUES(#{memKey}, #{subj}, #{studyNum}, #{bookNum}, #{yoil}, #{yoilSeq}, #{bookFlag}, #{visitHours}, #{empKey}, #{deptCD}, #{jisaCD}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID})

INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjRegist (registYMD, memKey, subj, registGubunCD, mFstName, mLstName, mBirthDay, gradeCD, schoolName, mEmail, eContact, ePhone, gFstName, gLstName, city, stateCD, zip, addr, gEmail, gPhone, gCellPhone, registWhy, registWhyEtc, registHow, registHowEtc, remarks, fstVisitYMD, yoil, visitHours, weekNum, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID, apmIdx) VALUES(#{registYMD}, #{memKey}, #{subj}, #{registGubunCD}, #{mFstName}, #{mLstName}, #{mBirthDay}, #{gradeCD}, #{schoolName}, #{mEmail}, #{eContact}, #{ePhone}, #{gFstName}, #{gLstName}, #{city}, #{stateCD}, #{zip}, #{addr}, #{gEmail}, #{gPhone}, #{gCellPhone}, IFNULL(#{registWhy},''), IFNULL(#{registWhyEtc},''), IFNULL(#{registHow},''), IFNULL(#{registHowEtc},''), #{remarks}, #{fstVisitYMD}, #{yoil}, #{visitHours}, #{weekNum}, #{studyNum}, #{bookNum}, #{digGrade}, #{empKey}, #{deptCD}, #{jisaCD}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID}, #{apmIdx})

INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjTuition (feeYMD, memKey, subj, memName, feeGubunCD, feeKindCD, freeType, registFee, sectionFee, monthFee, longFee, totalFee, expireYMD, bookNum, weekNum, monthNum, feeUnit, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID) VALUES(#{feeYMD}, #{memKey}, #{subj}, #{memName}, #{feeGubunCD}, #{feeKindCD}, #{freeType}, #{registFee}, #{sectionFee}, #{monthFee}, #{longFee}, #{totalFee}, #{expireYMD}, #{bookNum}, #{weekNum}, #{monthNum}, #{feeUnit}, #{empKey}, #{deptCD}, #{jisaCD}, #{regDate}, #{regID})
